name: Hello, Stranger!
description:
This is an incredible story of a man exposed to a deadly danger. Meet Max. He doesn’t remember, how he got onto the damn ocean floor, what happened, and where are the others. Max needs your help. Only you can help him make it and survive all the insanity and despair he happened to wake up in. Max’s real time adventures won’t leave you indifferent. Watch his pulse and be careful with your answers: the only one wrong step of yours can leave Max forever in the deep waters of the ocean.


Please note that all grammar errors in the text are intentional and meant to create a unique atmosphere of the game.
